description:
Problem: stale backup ref lockfiles can wedge sync/prune loops and cause repeated background refresh failures.

Design:
- In backup ref create/prune paths, detect locked ref errors, remove stale lockfile, retry once.
- Keep behavior idempotent and safe for concurrent daemon work.

Acceptance:
- [ ] Repro with pre-created stale lockfile no longer wedges sync
- [ ] Regression test covers stale lockfile cleanup+retry
- [ ] No correctness regression in backup ref retention/prune behavior
title: Handle stale refs/beads/backup/*.lock in sync backup ref maintenance
